pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, October 1, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

The Prime Minister will host a call with provincial and territorial premiers.

Closed to media.

The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks during the High-Level Meeting on the Twenty-Fifth Anniversary of the Fourth World Conference on Women. The event will be livestreamed from 9:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. at http://webtv.un.org/.

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna, and Chair of the Board of the Canada Infrastructure Bank Michael Sabia. A media availability will follow.

Room 200
Sir John A. Macdonald Building
144 Wellington Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#
